description: The Abyssal Sea God is an ancient deity, born from the deepest trenches of the ocean. Its form is an ever-shifting mass of tentacles, scales, and abyssal energy. It controls the ocean's most dangerous creatures, commanding the tides and storms with a mere thought. Those who gaze upon its true form are driven mad by its unfathomable power.
damage_resistances: Cold; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The Abyssal Sea God can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the Abyssal Sea God fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Tidal Wave (Recharge 5-6)
traits.description: The Abyssal Sea God can summon a massive tidal wave that crashes down on all creatures within a 120-foot radius, dealing 10d10 bludgeoning damage and knocking them prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Abyssal Sea God makes three attacks: one with its tentacles and two with its bite.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 26).

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Control Water (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The Abyssal Sea God can cast the spell Control Water at will.

legendary_actions.name: Tentacle Slam
legendary_actions.description: The Abyssal Sea God slams a creature it is grappling into the ground, dealing 35 (5d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

legendary_actions.name: Whirlpool (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.description: The Abyssal Sea God creates a whirlpool in the water around it, forcing all creatures within a 60-foot radius to make a DC 24 Strength saving throw or be pulled 30 feet toward the center of the whirlpool and restrained.

legendary_actions.name: Summon Sea Beasts (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.description: The Abyssal Sea God summons 1d4 giant sharks or 1 kraken under its command, which appear within 60 feet of it and remain for 1 hour or until they die.

lair_actions.name: Rising Tides
lair_actions.description: The Abyssal Sea God can cause the water level in its lair to rise rapidly, flooding the area and dealing 6d6 cold damage to all non-amphibious creatures.

regional_effects.name: Oceanic Terror
regional_effects.description: The waters within 6 miles of the Abyssal Sea Godâ€™s lair become turbulent, making it difficult to navigate and causing fear in all creatures that enter.
